title: Images and patchy communications reveal devastation in Tonga after tsunami unleashed by massive volcano eruption
content:
1. Images and patchy communications reveal devastation in Tonga after tsunami unleashed by massive volcano eruption  CBS News
  2. First images of Tonga volcano damage show entire communities covered in thick ash  CNN
  3. Undersea cable fault could cut off Tonga from rest of the world for weeks  Yahoo Finance
  4. Tonga tsunami cuts off nearly all island communications - BBC News  BBC News
  5. Bay Area Tongan Community Waiting for Answers From Family, Friends After Tsunami  NBC Bay Area
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: トンガの火山噴火による津波の被害は、画像と通信の途絶により明らかになった。
大规模火山爆发引发海啸后，汤加的图像和零星的通信显示了其破坏力。
大規模火山爆發引發海嘯後，湯加的圖像和零星的通信顯示了其破壞力。
